_sText:
After 6 beta-versions here the final de_severance.
This map takes place in a setting of  corridors, office rooms, a whinecellar, a nuclear lab, an outside village area, apartments and tunnels.
The counter-terrorists start in a garage with generators, while the terrorists start in a nice botanical hall. Designated bomb areas are; outside area and nuclear lab at water reservoir - A and B respectively.
The map isnÂ´t that huge, so with 64 players it gets a lil cramped, though still playable :)

There are:
- 64 Player-spawns
- 2 Bombspots
- radar map in bsp
- soundscapes
- rendered with lightmapscale 4

render-time: 2 min 47 sec

Optimized, balanced and tested with and for 64 Players on the Sachsenkneipe servers.

Special thanks to www.sachsenkneipe.de for testing and improving it!
Sachsenkneipe XL - 64 Slots: 193.192.58.170:27015

Enjoy playing it :)

wostok
